channel.title: Comments on: Code Example: Water Buoyancy Using Corona SDK

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: Thanks Adam. The site looks good. Can't wait to see your future tutorials. Cheers!
item.content:encoded: Thanks Adam. The site looks good. Can’t wait to see your future tutorials. Cheers!

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: I wasn't able to get in touch with the original author, so I'm posting my copy of the code here: https://github.com/CoronaGeek/Corona-SDK-Water-Buoyancy-Example
item.content:encoded: I wasn’t able to get in touch with the original author, so I’m posting my copy of the code here: https://github.com/CoronaGeek/Corona-SDK-Water-Buoyancy-Example

item.title: By: Doug Rogers
item.dc:creator: Doug Rogers
item.description: The water buoyancy concept and video looks extremely interesting. Unfortunately, I tried to visit the website, but could not download the code for the example. Visitors can download the code with a tweet and download, but the twitter link is not working. Does anyone out there have a copy of the code available? Thanks.
item.content:encoded: The water buoyancy concept and video looks extremely interesting. Unfortunately, I tried to visit the website, but could not download the code for the example. Visitors can download the code with a tweet and download, but the twitter link is not working. Does anyone out there have a copy of the code available? Thanks.

item.description: I still think this is one cool trick.
item.content:encoded: I still think this is one cool trick.
